org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.messages

Interface MessageSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockingReactor, IsolationReactor, NonBlockingReactor, ReactorBase, SwingBoundReactor, ThreadBoundReactor, UnboundReactor

    public interface MessageSource
    A source of messages, and which must be able to handle a response.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void incomingResponse(Message message, Reactor responseSource)
      Process an incoming response.

    • Method Detail

      • incomingResponse

        void incomingResponse(Message message,
                    Reactor responseSource)
        Process an incoming response.
        Parameters:
        message - The response.
        responseSource - The targetReactor returning the response.
